review.description: The pick your own berries are fabulous.  The owners are very friendly and laid back and the berries are SO good.  Reasonably priced AND organic!
review.author: Jenny L.

review.description: Blue Skies Berry Farm is much more than just berries. They are at the summer farmer's markets around Madison, including the famous Madison Farmer's Market. All Organic grown vegetables and berries. You can stop in and pick your own berries in season. Great stuff.
review.author: Mark B.
